name: Catalyst Oscilobot
description: Catalyst Oscilobot is an oscilloscope themed robot with a vibrant orange box body and a pair of stylish shades. Its arms and legs resemble those of a cat, adding a touch of playfulness to its design. The buttons on its body are reminiscent of a soldier's uniform, symbolizing its dedication and loyalty. The screen on its face also showcases a cat-like appearance, giving it a friendly and approachable look.
